original_text: They have not helped you to mend the broken walls of your city. The walls will not be strong enough to keep Israel's people safe on the day of the Lord. That is when I will allow your enemies to attack you.
korean_text: 너희 선지자들이 성 무너진 곳에 올라가지도 아니하였으며 이스라엘 족속을 위하여 여호와의 날에 전쟁에서 견디게 하려고 성벽을 수축하지도 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: to mend the broken walls of your city
The walls will not be strong enough
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성벽은 충분히 강하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: on the day of the Lord
That is when I will allow your enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 당신의 원수들을 허락할 것입니다
